dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.
dependencies.name: py-certifi

dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependencies.name: py-click

dependencies.description:
This is a GraphQL client for Python. Plays nicely with graphene,
graphql-core, graphql-js and any other GraphQL implementation compatible
with the spec. GQL architecture is inspired by React-Relay and Apollo-
Client.
dependencies.name: py-gql

dependencies.description:
GraphQL-core 3 is a Python 3.6+ port of GraphQL.js, the JavaScript
reference implementation for GraphQL, a query language for APIs created
by Facebook.
dependencies.name: py-graphql-core

dependencies.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)
dependencies.name: py-idna

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
This is a implementation of Promises in Python. It is a super set of
Promises/A+ designed to have readable, performant code and to provide
just the extensions that are absolutely necessary for using promises in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-promise

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.
dependencies.name: py-urllib3

dependencies.description: Voluptous, despite the name, is a Python data validation library.
dependencies.name: py-voluptuous

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.
dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe

description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice
name: py-sierrapy

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
